definition: enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand

sentences.english: The buzz droids are designed to disable, not destroy, enemy craft.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鸣机器人的设计目的是瘫痪，而非摧毁敌机。

sentences.english: The aircraft uses the Foxhunter multi-mode air-intercept radar to detect and target hostile aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 该机采用福克斯特多模空中拦截雷达探测和目标敌机。

sentences.english: The enemy planes were licked up by flames.
Operators of its secure communications system can guide friendly aircraft against enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 其安全系统的操作者能导引友机对抗敌机。

sentences.english: On June 24, we had a near-miss when an enemy plane dropped anti-personnel bombs near the starboard side of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 6月24日，我们的船的右侧船舷遭遇敌机仍的炸弹。

sentences.english: The rice mill was wrecked by the enemy bombing.
sentences.chinese: 碾米厂遭到了敌机的轰炸。

sentences.english: Three enemy planes were disposed of by us .
The enemy bombers targeted our arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 敌机把我们的兵工厂作为轰炸目标。

sentences.english: It is not safe for the ships to ride (at anchor) in the harbour when the enemy planes are hovering overhead.
sentences.chinese: 当敌机在上空盘旋时，船只停泊在港内是不安全的。

sentences.english: She shielded the wounded soldier from the strafing of the enemy plane with her own body.
sentences.chinese: 在敌机扫射时，她用自己的身子护住伤员。

sentences.english: The enemy plane homed in on the arms factory and destroyed it with one bomb.
sentences.chinese: 敌机瞄准了军工厂，用一颗炸弹把它摧毁了。

sentences.english: In this way, radar found enemy planes in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 雷达就是用这种方法在黑暗中发现敌机的。

sentences.english: Our battery accounted for three enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 我们炮兵连击落了三架敌机。

sentences.english: AWACS Thunderhead Bandit's in gun range.
The enemy planes bombed our city.
A number of enemy planes were brought down the moment they intruded into our territorial air.
sentences.chinese: 许多敌机一侵入我们的领空就被击落。

definition: to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to annihilate/to attack and destroy/Jianji, PRC fighter plane based on Soviet MiG/usually 殲擊8型|歼击8型
opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
